subject: Re: [junit] Regarding JUnit TestSuite creation and execution
msgSnippet: TestSuite suite=new TestSuite(); suite.addTest(new Calculator( CalculatorTestAdd )); suite.addTest(new Calculator( CalculatorTestSubtrac )); suite.addTest(new
messageBody:
TestSuite suite=new TestSuite();
suite.addTest(new Calculator("CalculatorTestAdd"));
suite.addTest(new Calculator("CalculatorTestSubtrac"));
suite.addTest(new Calculator("CalculatorTestMultiply"));
suite.addTest(new Calculator("CalculatorTestDevide"));


but you have to create new for TestSuite

> b. CalculatorTestSubtract
> c. CalculatorTestMultiply
> d. CalculatorTestDivide
>

>

> the above 4 test cases in the TestSuite.
>
> Can anyone help me in this situation.
>
> ---------------------------------
